metadata.name: H big 180 U I Injection solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in glaucoma and macular degeneration

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Anecortave acetate is combined with Pamidronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Anecortave acetate is combined with Zoledronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Anecortave acetate is combined with Alendronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Anecortave acetate is combined with Ibandronate
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Anecortave acetate is combined with Clodronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Anecortave acetate is combined with Risedronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Anecortave acetate is combined with Etidronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Anecortave acetate is combined with Tiludronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Anecortave acetate is combined with Incadronic acid
